title: Test
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, containing a total of 8 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of employees, of value 12239.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of employees about 8294.0 was reached at Year 2011
